title: PBE shop not working - Session Expired
body:
An error is preventing your store request from being processed at this time. This issue can typically be resolved by closing and relogging into the League of Legends client. We apologize for the inconvenience, and thank you for your patience.


If this problem persists, please contact us at support.riotgames.com


Restarted 5 times already - waiting for almost an hour..

replies.body: Check a couple of your network settings for me really quickly, specifically Port Forwarding and DNS settings. Adjusting those according to the steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) can get your network a cleaner signal to our servers most of the time.
